name: Sealion Fishing Tourney
description:
Get ready to fish as the sealion is hosting yet another fishing tourney!

Swim, catch, and bring back fish to gather as many points as you can! But be careful! You do need air and there are dangerous fish who might want to hurt you! Can you beat all the competitors?

Over 10 different kinds of fish catchable!

Controls
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move;

SPACE to catch fish and to drop em off at your cooler;

ENTER to skip text;

Many thanks to CalmRadish for their Lost Century color palette!
